Manx: O Vannin veg veen ayns yn aarkey ny lomarcan,
English: O, Dear little Mannin alone in the ocean,
EnglishOriginal: O Vannin veg veen ayns yn aarkey ny lomarkyn

Manx: Ta soar millish chonnee goll nish lesh ny gheayee,
English: A sweet gorse smell goes now on the wind,
EnglishOriginal: Tha soar millish chonnee gholl nish lesh ny gheayee

Manx: Ta’n niarragh ain reesht lesh fraassyn as summarkyn,
English: Our Spring again, with showers and primroses,
EnglishOriginal: Ta’n niarragh ain reesht lesh fraassyn as summyrken

Manx: Ny cruink ooilley coamrit lesh aittin as freoagh.
English: The hills all covered with gorse and heather.
EnglishOriginal: Ny chrink ooilley coamryt lesh ashyn as fraie
